MWC.Utilities.TextFormatting

Class GMTDateFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • java.text.DateFormat
        • java.text.SimpleDateFormat
          • MWC.Utilities.TextFormatting.GMTDateFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateAxisEditor.DatedRNFormatter, InternetDateFormat

    public class GMTDateFormat
extends java.text.SimpleDateFormat
    date formatter that forces use of GMT timezone
    Author:
    ian
